subject: Mathematics
question_text: Given below are two statements: Statement (I) : SiO 2 GeO 2 SnO PbO Statement (II) : Allotropic forms of carbon are due to property of catenation and pπ - dπ

options.text: (1) Both Statement I and Statement II are false
(2) Both Statement I and Statement II are true
(3) Statement I is true but Statement II is false
(4) Statement I is true but Statement II is true
